mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAMES(GAME_ID, GAME_DATE, TEAM_A, TEAM_B, GAME_RESULT) VALUES (#{gameId}, #{gameDate}, #{teamA}, #{teamB}, #{gameResult})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GAMES WHERE (GAME_ID LIKE '1%') AND (GAME_DATE >= SYSDATE)
SELECT * FROM GAMES WHERE (GAME_ID LIKE '2%' OR GAME_ID LIKE '3%') AND (GAME_DATE >= SYSDATE)
SELECT * FROM GAMES WHERE (GAME_ID LIKE '4%') AND (GAME_DATE >= SYSDATE)
SELECT * FROM GAMES WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN GAME_DATE-4 AND GAME_DATE-1
